pull.title: Properly format markdown so it renders properly on GitHub

events.message: Properly format so MD renders properly on GitHub

events.body:
offtopic: might be a good idea to setup travis to run markdownlint like we do in our [slips](https://github.com/satoshilabs/slips/blob/master/.travis.yml) repository.

Also see [markdownlint.json](https://github.com/satoshilabs/slips/blob/master/markdownlint.json) to see how to ignore some (imho excessive) rules.
For better or worse, BIPs aren't markdown (they're mediawiki).
Ah, sorry. I was confused, because the document in this PR was markdown. Nevermind :)
